title: bukkit内核命令阻止
author: kevinss
txt_content: 怎么阻止玩家输入bukkit内核自带指令，比如说bukkit:me

replies.author: Fisherman_wcz
replies.txt_content: 噗，这是ess的指令吧。禁掉权限。添加-essentials.me不知道打对没

replies.author: MysteryBoy
replies.txt_content: 用个命令黑名单插件就行了

replies.author: RE_OVO
replies.txt_content: 添加个-minecraft.command.me权限试试，注意前面有一杠
